title: Mystery at Heath Bar Farm
description: In this Dateline classic, Tom Foley, once a hometown hero in Coldwater, Michigan, is shocked to find himself as the lead suspect in the case of his wife Darlene's murder. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 18, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
